summary: 3 Different Tartan Furs made by Request.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1:

Female Textures are now up aswel, i deleted the old versions and now the only downloadable files contain ALL textures. this file wont be updated any more unless i get requests for different Tartans etc.

Callaghan04

Version 0.1

this file contains 3 Textures (In separate downloads), you can obviously only use one at a time, but the textured Tartans are:

Blackwatch No.2
Henderson OC
Grant Red OC

i have made this as a 0.1 because i have yet to make Female Textures, but see what you all think about this and feel free to make requests, also, give me your thoughts on my idea of changing all stormcloak rebels to be wearing this armor?

i would also like to thank everyone for requesting Tartan Textures, i pretty much feel like im the King of Tartan on the Nexus lol, almost ALL of my mods are Tartan Based now :S

ayway, female textures will come shortly.

Callaghan04

Permissions:

if you want to use my work then ask my permission, if i agree then credit me in the description and Readme, and send me a link to the finished product!
author: Callaghan04
